message:
Dears,

We would like to introduce to you ZABTNY

It is the first Egyptian social media platform. It is not a dating website the name is just unique  :)

We are trying to create a platform aimed to residents of Egypt, to help in adding value to their lives and not just waste their time. There are a couple of new feature which we are sure would interest you, like 

-Marketplace: Where you can see and buy anything.

-Forums: Where you can share a subject with the website members.

-Your very own Business Profile: Where you can post daily updates about your job.

-Private notes: Where you can write notes for yourself in a customized way.

I would like to personally invite you to this platform, Facebook page link: https://www.facebook.com/zabtny.comEgypt 

We look forward to hearing from you :)

*We am really sorry if you felt uncomfortable with such approach, but we are doing our best to be selective with our users and it would be our honor to have you all as members on our website.
story: Muhammad Haredi shared a Page to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Zabtny

data.message: what is wrong with dating websites :D
Guys it is white blank on mobile and tablets ...

Hi Ahmed,

The application is a work in progress but you can select full site to use the responsive theme.

I had devtools opened and this was the first thing I saw when I opened the website http://prntscr.com/5k4dvs
I understand it is still work on progress :) Will provide more constructive feedback after proper inspection
Good luck ... وظبطنا بقى :D
